name: Cursed (itch)
description: The Evil never asks for permission while breaking into a happy and peaceful life of lovebirds. Then, they have to fight for their future. Will you have enough bravery to help the main lady character find her fiancé in an ominous cursed estate? Are you ready to face dragons, ghosts, skeletons, demons and other creatures from beyond? Will you be able to puzzle out all the mysteries and to overcome all the difficulties and obstacles? The fate of the engaged couple as well as the estate inhabitants and of the whole world is in your hands!
